text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

translation.en: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain]
translation.id: Dan orang-orang yang berusaha menentang ayat-ayat Kami melemahkan (menggagalkan azab Kami), mereka itu dimasukkan ke dalam azab
